section.p: This template represents information about the overall health status of the patient. To represent the impact of a specific problem or concern related to the patient's expected health outcome use the Prognosis Observation template 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.113.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-16756, CONF:1098-16757, CONF:1098-32558 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Health Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32486)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-19143)/@code="11323-3" Health status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-19144, CONF:1098-32161)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-9074)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19103)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Health Status Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9057, R2.0=CONF:1098-9057)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9072, R2.0=CONF:1098-9072)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32486)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-19143)/@code="11323-3" Health status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-19144, CONF:1098-32161)
contain zero or one [0..1] text
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-9074)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19103)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HealthStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.12 DYNAMIC (CONF:9075, R2.0=CONF:1098-9075)
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:9271)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15530)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:9272)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1377434104"/> <code code="11323-3" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Health status"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16756, CONF:16757 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.5"
Consol Health Status Observation text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:9271)
Consol Health Status Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15530)
Consol Health Status Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:9272)
SHALL conform to CDA Observation
Consol Health Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:9057, R2.0=CONF:1098-9057)
Consol Health Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:9072, R2.0=CONF:1098-9072)
Consol Health Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11323-3" Health status (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:9073)
Consol Health Status Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:9270)
Consol Health Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:9074)

Consol Health Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet HealthStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.20.12 DYNAMIC (CONF:9075, R2.0=CONF:1098-9075)
